text: I yesli by dva otryada iz veruyushchikh srazhalis', to primirite ikh. Yesli zhe odin budet nespravedliv protiv drugogo, to srazhaytes' s tem, kotoryy nespravedliv, poka on ne obratitsya k veleniyu Allakha. A yesli on obratitsya, to primirite ikh po spravedlivosti i bud'te bespristrastny: ved' Allakh lyubit bespristrastnykh
